name: Block Breaker - Course Project
description:
Another game project created through the Udemy course: https://www.udemy.com/unitycourse/learn/v4/overvie...

This project took me a lot longer to produce due to some personal issues and also a struggle with the code that allowed for a part of the game I have dubbed "Mirror Madness" where there is an opposite paddle that reflects your movement, allowing a more difficult part of the game.

Here is the workaround for anyone interested in the forum created by those behind the above Udemy course: https://community.gamedev.tv/t/need-help-inverting...

Next few games I hope to be more interesting and fun to play, but will also be making sure all these projects are free for all.
